items.sentence: Tom didn\'t say how much money he had spent.
Tom didn\'t say what was really on his mind.
Tom didn\'t say where he was planning to go.
Tom didn\'t say who he was planning to meet.
I thought you weren\'t going to tell anyone.
Tom jumped out of bed and ran to the window.
Tom left his wife at home with the children.
Tom likes his coffee without cream or sugar.
Tom likes playing practical jokes on people.
I can\'t believe I\'m even considering this.
I can\'t believe I\'m really talking to you.
Tom inherited all of his father\'s property.
Tom is deeply grateful for all Mary\'s help.
How do you know that Tom doesn\'t like Mary?
Do you know why Tom wasn\'t there yesterday?
I recognized her by the hat she was wearing.
I remember that you said that you had a car.
I saw Tom and Mary in the park this morning.
I saw Tom here in the park just a while ago.
I think Tom is a lot better singer than you.
